review: The Fire Stick is amazing. So easy to use with a wide veriety of content.
author: Brian P. Buckman

review: awesome product, i waited enough time to have it, and it was worth the waiting.
author: Luis Herrera

review: The WiFi receiver is weaker than I expected, but overall it is designed well and delivers HD content to my TV with the exception of a few apps.
author: Bryan Ludwig

review: Ok first of all I'm a non-techy kinda Grandma so I'm not sure how to answer this......I got a large tv downstairs which is Grandkid territory -----My youngest son installed the fire stick and I'm told it works fine.....since I don't use it myself that's the best I can do folks.
author: KAY

review: love it. supper easy to set up and use. couldn't wait for it to arrive so I coukd stream movies. defenitly worth it
author: Rhonda

review: I'VE HAD IT A WEEK OR TWO AND HAVEN'T GOTTEN TO USE IT YET. I BOUGHT IT TO PLAY THINGS FROM THE COMPUTER TO THE BIG SCREEN TV. I DO NOT THINK IT WILL DO THAT. I ONLY SEE WHERE YOU CAN PURCHASE CERTAIN VIDEOS AND GAMES,TO SEE.
author: HAMAND

review: Was easy to install. Works great
author: Brian McMahon

review: Five Stars is NOT enough to say how I feel about the Fire TV Stick.  Once my contract is over with my cable company, it is buh bye to them and HELLO to $175/mo savings on that bill.  All thanks to Amazon's Fire Stick.Update:  I've gone through the apps list and couldn't find a web browser, which would give freedom to watch streaming news from our local stations.  I hope a web browser will be provided in the near future.  Still love the device... :0)
author: PuppyWuppy

review: Nice. I can cut back off of some cable channel.
author: SHARON

review: The next big thing is here
author: Travis Chapman
